name: CreepOut (edy12345)
description:
Creep Out

Creep Out of the Nest you are in, activate the levers on the level to unlock the exit and try to avoid touch anything in a Chaotic Environment Invested of spores. And Hope you reach the End!

Good Luck!

Controls: -'WASD' or 'Arrow Keys' to move , Jump and Crouch. - Press 'W' on the air to create a plataform below you. (lasts 2s) - 'E'  interact with Levers and doors.

 Still got some work to Do but Hope You Guys Like it.
